DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the ECG was performed represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date of the ECG?
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date of the ECG?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the date the ECG was done using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: EGDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable EGDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A complete date is expected. The date of collection may be determined from the date of visit (VISDAT) and if so, a separate assessment date field is not required.
